name: Flying Car Game - Future Police Chase 3D
name_original: Flying Car Game - Future Police Chase 3D
description:
It's 2017!
The Best Flying Car Simulator Awaits you! Drive & Fly Futuristic Muscle Car a game set in 2016 not transitioning in 2017.

In future USA Police is providing Flying Police Shuttle Service in different cities of USA . Future Dream of Simulation is not just driving a car but also flying a car. Mostly Criminal has done a crime and police was unable to chase them and catch them because of traffic but because of Flying Police Muscle Car Our Police will mobilize and easily catch and chase criminal when prison break occur.

Be the best car driver & Flying Police Car Pilot!

If you want to drive a Police Muscle Car and that muscle car can fly like a jet aircraft . If you want to test your helicopter & Airplane pilot skills and you also want to drive a car at the same time Then Futuristic Flying Police Muscle Car game is perfect for you! Fly your helicopter plane car around the city world
You can also burn the asphalt road by performing car stunt and drift your car at the same time

Crime Madness has engulfed the area, Mafia Cars are roaming like in the likes of new york city, police vs mafia madness is spreading, now your task is to fly as good as you can drive as fast as you can.

Flying Police Muscle Car 3D is made for those who love to play free car driving games, free car racing game , free airplane flight game Simulation games as well as Airplane Flight games

This simulation game is perfect flight simulator for Police Chase related adventure, it contains driving, Flying a car of your dreams.

** Flying Police Muscle Car 2017 - Game Features
- Live life of Police Hero!
- Earn Point, Make Hight Score in limited Time.
- Drive & Fly around in the 3d kingdoms like city
- Become the best Police driver & Pilot ever!
- It will Train you as BadAss Police Officer
- FREE download , Have Fun
- No Wifi No Problem!
- Free Play Simulation Game * Contain Ads -
